name: urging
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of strongly advising or encouraging someone to do a particular thing: With their dad's urging, the girls started playing tennis at a young age. It was only because of Michele's urgings that he sold the house. See
urge
More examplesFewer examplesHe accepted the post largely because of strong urgings from his wife.Flu makes thousands of people sick, but they seldom heed urgings to seek the vaccine.He is being pressed to retire from boxing, and the most fervent urgings come from those who admire him most.
